dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Improper use of domain name]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, November 27, 2005 12:46 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; paolillo@indiana.edu
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Improper use of domain name]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Improper use of domain name
Date: Sat, 26 Nov 2005 11:17:36 -0500
From: John Paolillo <paolillo@indiana.edu>
To: abuse@theplanet.com, admins@theplanet.com, adimns@theplanet.com
CC: John Paolillo <paolillo@indiana.edu>, bp@virginia.edu,
ascweb@usc.edu,        Journal of Computer-Mediated Communication
<jcmc@indiana.edu>

Dear Peter Pathos,

You are listed in the ARIN WHOIS database as the network technical and abuse
contact for the server www.ascusc.org, at the IP address 70.85.166.180
(WHOIS record included below). I am writing to inform you that the site
currently operating under that name and address is violating the trademarks
and copyrights of the Journal of Computer Mediated Communication, the
University of Southern California, and the Annenberg School of
Communication. The page at the following URL bears copyrighted material and
logos from all three trademark and copyright
holders:

http://www.ascusc.org/jcmc/

Moreover, the other pages on this server, whose links are hidden in the HTML
source of this pirated page, are presently used for marketing pornography,
and none of our organizations permit the use of our trademarks and
copyrights for this purpose. We respectfully ask that you investigate this
situation and terminate the operation of the offending website.

Thank you for your attention,

John C. Paolillo
Technical Editor, Journal of Computer-Mediated Communication



http://ws.arin.net/cgi-bin/whois.pl
Search results for: 70.85.166.180

OrgName:    ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
OrgID:      TPCM
Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Address:    Suite 110
City:       Dallas
StateProv:  TX
PostalCode: 75207
Country:    US

ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321

NetRange:   70.84.0.0 - 70.87.127.255
CIDR:       70.84.0.0/15, 70.86.0.0/16, 70.87.0.0/17
NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13
NetHandle:  NET-70-84-0-0-1
Parent:     NET-70-0-0-0-0
NetType:    Direct Allocation
NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM
NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM
Comment:
RegDate:    2004-07-29

RTechHandle: PP46-ARIN

RTechPhone:  +1-214-782-7800
RTechEmail:  adimns@theplanet.com

OrgAbuseHandle: ABUSE271-ARIN

OrgAbusePhone:  +1-214-782-7802

OrgNOCHandle: TECHN33-ARIN

additional hints on searching ARIN's WHOIS database.

Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
